name: Rainbowdash.net Dynamic Width Mode
description: Makes the site wider (87% of the screen to be exact, from 840 to 1380 pixels wide). When the window is wider than 1300px, also activates a special widescreen mode that makes better use of the width.

user.name: RedEnchilada
user.about:
Most of the userstyles I post to this site are for Rainbow Dash Network. I work on the visual design over there. Userstyles I post here will be either alternate utilities that give RDN a different feel or just silly things - mostly the latter because abusing CSS3 animations gives me a morbid sense of pleasure c:
